alert.note: Alert for North Zone Bridger Teton NF and Grand Teton NP; Salt and Wyoming Ranges, West Zone Bridger Teton NF; West Wind River Mountains, East Zone Bridger Teton NF (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 22 at 3:10AM MDT until July 22 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * IMPACTS: Low Humidities...Hot Temperatures...and Strong Gusty Winds may lead to erratic fire behavior. * AFFECTED AREA: In Northwest WY Fire Zone....415. In West Central WY Fire Zones...414...416. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont. In North Central WY...Park. In West Central WY...Lincoln...Sublette...Teton. * WIND: West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. Isolated showers and thunderstorms could bring brief erratic 40 to 50 mph gusts. * HUMIDITY: 12 to 18 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the mid to upper 80s in the valleys, with 70s in the mountains.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: North Zone Bridger Teton NF and Grand Teton NP; Salt and Wyoming Ranges, West Zone Bridger Teton NF; West Wind River Mountains, East Zone Bridger Teton NF
